menu.description: Ph·ªü, the quintessence of Vietnamese cuisine, is considered a symphony of flavors. The blend of broth simmered for hours with typical spices, served with soft and smooth rice noodles, creates a dish filled with delicate flavors.

items.name: Beef Ph·ªü (Ph·ªü B√≤)
items.ingredients: Beef topside, Beef belly, Asian herbs, Bean sprouts, Fresh chilies and Lime

items.name: Stir Fried Marinated Beef Ph·ªü (Ph·ªü B√≤ T√°i LƒÉn)

items.name: Seafood Ph·ªü (Ph·ªü H·∫£i S·∫£n)

items.name: Vegan Ph·ªü (Ph·ªü Chay)
items.ingredients: Tofu, mushroom, Lotus root, Pak Choi, Asian herbs, Bean sprouts, Fresh chilies and Lime

menu.description: Our curry is made from potatoes and tomatoes, carrots and onions, and a little bit of Japanese curry style. Please choose to enjoy your curry with Rice / Rice Vermicelli / Sourdough bread.

menu.description: Our Burger will be served with fries

menu.description: All ingredients are immersed in our home-made sweet & sour sauce, presented in a hot cast iron pan, giving you an amazing dish till the last bite. And please be careful as it's really hot!
